1.『王家の迷宮へ行く』では 王家の迷宮へ|冒険に出発します。迷宮には アンルシアと:
In Going to the Royal Labyrinth, you're going|on an adventure to the Royal Labyrinth... In|the labyrinth, you can take Anglesea and her|
|fellow monsters with you... In the labyrinth,|when the glow of courage in the upper left|corner of the screen reaches zero, you'll be|
|thrown out. Defeat monsters and collect light|balls as you move on to the next room before|the glow of courage runs out... To get to the|
|labyrinth, you need <%nL_KISEKI_NUM> gems of|courage. You can get <%nL_WEEK_NUM> bravery|stones per week... In the "Prepare for|
|Unlucia" section, you can change Unlucia's|equipment, assign skills, and more... If you|have a dress-up outfit, you can also change|
|her outfit... In "Increase Blackstone" you|can increase the number of brilliance stones|by offering the brilliance stone belts found|
|in the Royal Labyrinth... You can increase|the effectiveness of your belt of brilliance|to a maximum of four by using an item called|
|the Secret Stone of Awakening. You can get it|from the special monster that appears in the|Royal Labyrinth, Yumemi's Incarnation, which|
|drops it from Yumemi's Dark Box. Also,|defeating the incarnation of Yumemi will|raise your treasure level. The higher your|
|treasure level, the more likely it is that|the incarnation of Yumemi will drop a high-|value box, such as the Dark Box of Yumemi.

34.王家の迷宮は アンルシアと|仲間モンスターを連れていくことができる|ソロプレイダ:
The Royal Labyrinth is a solo-player dungeon|where you can take Anglesea and her fellow|monsters... To challenge the Royal Labyrinth,|
|you need <%nL_KISEKI_NUM> bravery stones...|You can get <%nL_WEEK_NUM> of courage stones|per week... You can also increase the number|
|of bravery stones by dedicating the bravery|belts found in the Royal Labyrinth... In the|labyrinth, the glow of courage in the upper|
|left corner of the screen will gradually|decrease, and when it reaches zero, you'll be|kicked out... You must defeat monsters and|
|collect balls of light to advance to the next|room before the glow of courage runs out...|In the next room, the balls of light you've|
|collected will be replaced by a spark of|courage, and the remaining spark of courage|will disappear. There are many ways to use|
|the courage glow in the labyrinth. Be careful|not to use it too much...

35.『アンルシアの準備』から アンルシアの装備変更|スキル振り分けなど 各種設定がで:
From "Preparing for Unlucia" you can change|Unlucia's equipment, assign her skills, and|more. If you have a dress-up outfit, you can|
|change her outfit... In the labyrinth, you|can also change her mission from "Unlucia" in|the main command...

36.王家の迷宮を進めていくと 迷宮の中に|ゆめみの化身と ボーナスミミックという|ス:
As you progress through the royal labyrinth,|special monsters called "incarnations of|dreaming" and "bonus mimics" will appear in|
|the labyrinth. Both the incarnation of|Dreaming and the bonus mimic will always drop|a Dream Box... Each time you defeat an|
|incarnation of Dreaming, its treasure level|will increase, making it more likely to drop|a more valuable box. However, the odds of it|
|appearing in a tougher form will also|increase, so you'll have to carefully assess|whether you can defeat it and take on the|
|challenge when the situation calls for it...|Bonus mimics can trigger a fever when|defeated, and more bonus mimics will appear|
|nearby... This is your chance to get more|Dream Chests, but you won't be able to get|the Spark of Courage and the Ball of Light by|
|fighting the bonus mimic. You'll have to be|careful with the rest of your Spark of|Courage...

37.めざめの秘石は 王家の迷宮に出現する|スペシャルモンスター ゆめみの化身が落とす:
The Secret Stone of Awakening is an item that|can be obtained from Yumemi's Dark Box, which|is dropped by the special monster Yumemi|
|Incarnate that appears in the Royal|Labyrinth. If you have the Mezame no Hideshi,|you can use it to increase the effects of|
|your pyrotechnic belt to a maximum of four...

38.封印の砂は 『封印の砂を増やす』を選んで|輝石のベルトを 光の扉に捧げることで|:
The sealing sand can be obtained by selecting|"More sealing sand" and offering your|pyroxene belt to the Door of Light. With the|
|sealing sand, you can seal up to|<%nL_SEAL_MAX> of the various effects on your|belt of brilliance. The sealed effects will|
|not be applied to any other belt you acquire|after that. If you want to undo a sealed|effect, you can use the "Reset Sealed Effect"|
|option to reset all previous settings... To|do this, you'll need 50 sealing sands, but|you'll get back the sands you used to seal|
|it.

39.輝石のベルトの効果の 封印状態を|リセットします。|<br>|リセットには 封印:
Resetting the sealing effect of the pyroxene|belt... To reset it, you'll need|<%nL_POINT_NUM> of sealing sand, but the|
|<%nL_GET_NUM> you've used to seal it so far|will be returned... Are you sure you want to|reset it?

40.輝石のベルトの効果を 封印していません。|<end>: I've sealed the effects of the pyroxene|belt...<end>
